Attillah/Shivah/Luzbel/Thypon::


Thyphon::

He was right, it was a bot... A enemy bot. Quickly Thyphon was 
swimming, and hit Ignatius with his powerful tail.

Attilla/Shivah::

Attilla noticed the missiles and he shot destroyin them, letting 
Shivah shot agains Slayer (25 shots)

Luzbel::

Luzbel avoided the shot and  shot 25 times against Ignatius.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> I think they're far off.
> 
> ::Slayer::
> 
> Slayer easilly avoids Ignatius's missiles, leaving them to head 
> toward his pursuers.
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., airly2000@y... wrote:
> > OOC: Are Slayer and Ignatius around my base or the're  far away?
> > 
> > Attilla/Luzbel/Shivah/Thyphon::
> > 
> > The dragons spreaded, avoiding the shots. "Can we end this play 
> > soon??" said Shivah while he checked his comm link"Master is 
> calling 
> > us..." 
> > 
> > " SHUT UP AND HUNT!!!" answered Attilla and Luzbel
> > 
> > Thyphon::
> > 
> > Thyphon felt something strange, something was close to him, he 
> can't 
> > identify what was or who was.
